document.full_text: chinese computer maker lenovo group ltd's has agreed to buy germany's medion ag in a deal valuing the electronics retailer at up to $900 million, to boost its market share in europe.
document.title: lenovo buys german computer seller medion
lines_and_colors: chinese computer maker lenovo group ltd's has agreed to buy germany's medion ag in a deal valuing the electronics retailer at up to $900 million, to boost its market share in europe.
